languages.text: Пока корабли еретиков прикрывают с орбиты ставку мятежников, наземные силы не смогут начать наступление. Вольному Торговцу предстоит дать им бой.

So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.
languages.original_text: Пока корабли еретиков прикрывают с орбиты ставку мятежников, наземные силы не смогут начать наступление. Вольному Торговцу предстоит дать им бой.

traits.locale_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

languages.text: Tant que les vaisseaux des hérétiques continueront de couvrir le centre de commandement des traîtres depuis l'orbite, les troupes au sol ne pourront pas avancer. Pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, la première étape de cette campagne consistera donc à attaquer la flotte.
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

traits.locale_text: Tant que les vaisseaux des hérétiques continueront de couvrir le centre de commandement des traîtres depuis l'orbite, les troupes au sol ne pourront pas avancer. Pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, la première étape de cette campagne consistera donc à attaquer la flotte.

languages.text: 只要异端分子的飞船依然能从轨道上空为叛徒的指挥中心提供掩护，地面部队就无法开始推进。因此这场战役的第一步，是消灭敌方所有舰队。
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

traits.locale_text: 只要异端分子的飞船依然能从轨道上空为叛徒的指挥中心提供掩护，地面部队就无法开始推进。因此这场战役的第一步，是消灭敌方所有舰队。

languages.text: 異端者の船が軌道上から反逆者の司令部に援護射撃を続ける限り、地上軍は進軍できない。そのため、この作戦での自由開拓者の最初の務めは、艦隊と交戦することである。
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

traits.locale_text: 異端者の船が軌道上から反逆者の司令部に援護射撃を続ける限り、地上軍は進軍できない。そのため、この作戦での自由開拓者の最初の務めは、艦隊と交戦することである。

languages.text: So lange die Schiffe der Ketzer der Befehlszentrale der Verräter weiterhin aus dem Orbit Feuerschutz geben, können die Bodentruppen ihren Vormarsch nicht beginnen. Der erste Schritt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in diesem Feldzug muss daher darin bestehen, die Flotte anzugreifen.
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

traits.locale_text: So lange die Schiffe der Ketzer der Befehlszentrale der Verräter weiterhin aus dem Orbit Feuerschutz geben, können die Bodentruppen ihren Vormarsch nicht beginnen. Der erste Schritt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in diesem Feldzug muss daher darin bestehen, die Flotte anzugreifen.

languages.text: Mientras las naves de los herejes sigan proporcionando fuego de cobertura al centro de mando de los traidores desde la órbita, las fuerzas de tierra no podrán avanzar. Por lo tanto, el primer paso de la campaña de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debe ser eliminar la flota.
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.

traits.locale_text: Mientras las naves de los herejes sigan proporcionando fuego de cobertura al centro de mando de los traidores desde la órbita, las fuerzas de tierra no podrán avanzar. Por lo tanto, el primer paso de la campaña de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debe ser eliminar la flota.

languages.text: Kâfirlerin gemileri, yörüngeden hainlerin komuta merkezine koruma ateşi sağlamaya devam ettiği sürece kara kuvvetleri ilerleyemez. Bu yüzden Hür Tacir'in bu seferdeki ilk hamlesi filoyu görevlendirmek olmalı.
languages.original_text: So long as the heretics' ships continue to provide covering fire to the traitors' command centre from orbit, the ground forces cannot begin their advance. Therefore, the Rogue Trader's first step in this campaign is to engage the fleet.
